articles.title: 'Lakes' under Mars south pole may not be real - CanIndia News
articles.description: Subsurface lakes found under Mars' south pole, using data from the European Space Agency's Mars Express orbiter, may not really be lakes at all, argue
articles.content:
Subsurface lakes found under Mars’ south pole, using data from the European Space Agency’s Mars Express orbiter, may not really be lakes at all, argue researchers.

articles.title: Countries send help to fight huge forest fire in Cyprus - CBC.ca
articles.description: Cyprus asked fellow European Union nations on Saturday to help battle a huge forest fire in a mountainous region of the east Mediterranean island nation that has forced the evacuation of at least seven villages.

articles.title: COVID: Europe races to vaccinate amid surge in Delta variant - msnNOW
articles.description: Experts predict that the delta variant could become the predominant strain in Europe by August. Many are calling for a more comprehensive vaccination campaign to prevent the spread of the highly transmissible mutation.
articles.content: European nations are racing to vaccinate their populations against the coronavirus amid fears that the highly transmissible delta variant could spark another COVID wave and overwhelm health systems.… [+2333 chars]
